sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: (Defaults to image on the left side.)

sub_fields.label: Media Type
sub_fields.name: media_type
sub_fields.instructions: Note: If neither "image" or" video" is selected, the content will appear full-width inside the pane.

sub_fields.label: Photos
sub_fields.name: photos
sub_fields.instructions: (Note: The text on the lower part of the image will be pulled from the image's "Caption" field. Hover over the image and click the pencil icon to add or edit the caption.)
